messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the target obeys the commands of the caster?
The target obeys the commands of the caster without exception until the next combat round concludes.
You are a helpful assistant.
How much does the target cost to cast?
10 POW
You are a helpful assistant.
How much does Enchant Book cost to cast?
variable POW; 1D4 Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does Enchant Book take to cast?
3 days
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the required ink for the Summon/Bound Star Vampire spell?
The book's ink must contain the ichor of a star vampire.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of creating an Elder Sign?
An Elder Sign costs 10 POW to create.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of an Elder Sign when made active?
An Elder Sign makes a path unusable to minions of the Great Old Ones and Mythos Gods, as well as to those greater beings themselves.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the caster's POW when using the Summon/Bound Star Vampire spell?
The caster sacrifices a varying amount of POW, loses 1D4 Sanity points, and meditates for three days.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can an Elder Sign be formed into?
leaden seal, carved in rock, forged in steel, etc.
You are a helpful assistant.
What effect does an Elder Sign have when made active beside an opening or Gate?
Makes that path unusable to minions of the Great Old Ones and Mythos Gods, as well as to those greater beings themselves.
You are a helpful assistant.
Is the Elder Sign worthless in personal defense if a monster or minion can evade the Sign?
Yes, it is.
You are a helpful assistant.
What protection might an individual wearing an Elder Sign around the neck gain?
Protection for a few square inches of flesh where the Sign rests against the skin.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of an Elder Sign when made active beside an opening or gate?
It makes that path unusable to minions of the Great Old Ones and Mythos Gods, as well as to those greater beings themselves.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the limitation of an Elder Sign in personal defense?
The rest of the wearer's body would be completely vulnerable.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is another name for the Elder Sign?
The Elder Seal, The Omen Branch, The Five Points of Wisdom.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required for a spell to imbue magic into a device or artifact?
A blood sacrifice, the sacrifice of magic points, the loss of 1D4 or more Sanity points, and at least a game day of time.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does the Elder Sign mean without the spell?
Nothing and has no effect.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of wearing an Elder Sign on the neck?
The rest of the wearer's body would be completely vulnerable.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the spell that involves a blood sacrifice, the sacrifice of magic points, the loss of 1D4 or more Sanity points, and at least a game day of time?
Enchantment Spells
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the names of the four enchanted items of permanent duration for which no spell of creation is known?
the Glass from Leng, the Lamp of Alhazred, the Plutonian Drug, and the Shining Trapezohedron
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the risks associated with crafting an enchantment or an artifact?
The item may have unpredictable advantages and disadvantages.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the potential consequences of using an enchanted item, according to the text?
investigators to monstrous encounters, or could offer a way to another dimension.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of crafting an Enchant Knife?
Variable POW; 1D4 Sanity
You are a helpful assistant.
How many Sanity points are lost when crafting an Enchant Knife?
1D4 Sanity
